post.author: 김태희
post.content:
nt/ Senior Java Developers

Position Type: Full Time, Temporary/Contract/Project
Job Location: Toronto, ON



The IBM – Resource on Demand Team is currently seeking Int/ Senior Java Developers for contract opportunities in the Torontoarea



Mandatory Skills:

·         Minimum of 5 Years of development experience

·         Experience in the following technologies;

o       J2EE development experience in BEA Weblogic

o       Java/JMS/XML/SOAP/Web services experience/SOA

o       Eclipse/Workshop IDE

·         Must have detailed design experience and UML design experience

·         Understanding of clustering and performance tuning in J2EE is ideal.
post.title: JAVA ,Weblogic-IBM
